ABOUT.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT.ABOUT_ME_PARAGRAPH:
Hi! I'm Anna and welcome to my portfolio website! I coded this site myself initally as a statically hosted website on GitHub pages so that I could teach myself more about HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. This site is an ongoing process and is slightly adjusted every couple of weeks to my liking as I learn more about web design. 
Now more about me! I'm currently a junior studying Computer Science and Visual Arts at Emory University. I'm really interested in front-end development and UI design. I'm also incredibly passionate about art. I love filling out my sketchbooks as well forcing every friend I have to make art with me. I'm also a devout believer in daily naps, green tea with honey and lemon, and warm blankets.
ABOUT.ABOUT_ME_TEXT: Whether you're here to peruse, stalk, or contemplate hiring, welcome and I'm glad you're here!
